block.p: Julie Ann Fergang, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Allen S. Fergang of New York, is to be married this evening to Steven Matthew Rosefsky, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Bernard S. Rosefsky of Atlanta. Rabbi Allan Schranz is to officiate at the University Club in New York.
The bride, who graduated magna cum laude from Tufts University, and the bridegroom, a magna cum laude graduate of the University of Vermont, received law degrees from Cornell.

Julie Ann Fergang, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Allen S. Fergang of New York, is to be married this evening to Steven Matthew Rosefsky, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Bernard S. Rosefsky of Atlanta. Rabbi Allan Schranz is to officiate at the University Club in New York.
The bride, who graduated magna cum laude from Tufts University, and the bridegroom, a magna cum laude graduate of the University of Vermont, received law degrees from Cornell.

The bride, 30, is an associate in the New York office of Paul, Hastings, Janofsky & Walker, the Los Angeles law firm. The bridegroom, 33, is an associate in the New York office of Jones, Day, Reavis & Pogue, the Cleveland law firm.
